meanings.definition: A type of French soup made with leeks and potatoes.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a warm bowl of barbottes for dinner.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best barbottes in town.
meanings.sent3: The barbottes were so delicious that I asked for seconds.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the barbottes filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of the barbottes melted in my mouth, leaving a savory taste.

meanings.definition: A small, pointed projection on a fish hook.
meanings.sent1: The barbottes on the fish hook helped catch a big trout.
meanings.sent2: Be careful with the barbottes on the hook, they are sharp.
meanings.sent3: The fisherman chuckled as the barbottes on the hook glinted in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The barbottes on the hook gleamed like tiny swords ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The barbottes on the hook snagged the fish effortlessly, securing a fresh catch.

meanings.definition: A type of protective armor for the lower part of the face.
meanings.sent1: The knight wore sturdy barbottes to shield his chin in battle.
meanings.sent2: The barbottes provided excellent protection during the jousting tournament.
meanings.sent3: The shiny barbottes made the knight look like a futuristic warrior.
meanings.sent4: The barbottes on his face gleamed under the sun, intimidating his opponents.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the barbottes added a touch of elegance to the knight's armor.
